abstract:
Tyres are the only physical connection between a car and the road, and
have traditionally been the least connected part of increasingly complex
vehicles, until now.

Connesso is an IoT product that provides the driver with information on
the tyre operating conditions by exploiting a set of sensors mounted in
the Pirelli tyres tread groove.

The on-board sensors report pressure, temperature, and load data to the
Pirelli cloud via a receiver unit connected with bluetooth to a mobile
app.

Real-time analytics and visualization of available data enable the
system to report tyre consumption, residual mileage, maintenance status
and potential breakdowns.

For the first time in history, tyres have a voice. Do they also have
dreams?
description:
Pirelli has given a voice to their tyres. Connesso is an IoT product
that, thanks to a set of sensors mounted in the tyres tread groove, is
capable of providing real-time analytics and visualisation of tyre
consumption, residual mileage, maintenance status and potential
breakdowns.
title: Do tyres dream of electric clouds?
